/usr/bin/clang++ -g CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/ParticleGenerator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/ballObject.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/breakoutGame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/core.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/gameLevel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/gameObject.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/graphicsManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/particleGenerator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/resourceManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/spriteRenderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyExecutable.dir/src/texture.cpp.o -o MyExecutable  -lGLFW /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so -lglad
